scripts.postinstall: concurrently "npm run install:products" "npm run install:pandas" "npm run install:users"
scripts.install:products: cd products && npm run clean && npm install
scripts.install:pandas: cd pandas && npm run clean && npm install
scripts.install:users: cd users && npm run clean && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:products" "npm run start:pandas" "npm run start:users"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:products" "npm run dev:pandas" "npm run dev:users"
